# Dayfiles

Dayfiles is a file workflow platform focused on image and PDF operations for daily team work.

## Canonical Site
- https://dayfiles.com/

## Live Tools
- https://everydayimagestudio.dayfiles.com/
- https://pdf.dayfiles.com/

## Summary
- Dayfiles helps users create, convert, organize, and share files.
- Primary capabilities include image workflows and PDF workflows.
- The platform also includes beta features such as File Copilot, Shared Workspaces, and Smart File Tags.
